name: Intervallic
description:
Intervallic is a rhythm game where you use a MIDI instrument or computer keyboard to control a flying space cat around the planet of Audius! Intervallic helps you learn to play music and works to make practicing your instrument more fun and engaging!

In this 2D side scroller, each note that you play moves the cat up and down on the screen based on the musical intervals that you play (Intervallic!). Objects are arranged so that by the end of each level as you collect notes and dodge obstacles you have played a full song. Collect notes in each phrase to unlock each record and collect all of the records to beat the level.

Features of Intervallic

  • A "classic" mode where you must play the song exactly
  • A "rhythm" mode that puts your timing skills to the test
  • Midi input from your electronic keyboard, guitar or any electronic midi instrument
  • Several tutorials on the game's mechanics
  • 5 song packs including both original music and remixes of classic songs
  • A 7-level campaign mode

This is an early release of the full game in order to gather user feedback for development. Please feel free to reach out to us on our Discord or support email with issues or to share feedback. We are a group of college students passionate about games, music, and education!

Our full release plans to include the following in-development features:

  • A level editor and sharing platform
  • Additional "biomes" which focus on varying styles of music
  • More robust feedback and tips for improvement
  • Support for more instruments
  • An original soundtrack
  • Additional story and character development

Technical Details

This game is built and tested on Windows and macOS. We currently support standard computer keyboard input and MIDI input -- for MIDI, a keyboard is recommended.
